name: Random Search
description: This algorithm makes random moves on the Minesweeper board.
additionalMessage: No specific strategy is employed, only random guesses.

name: Neuro Evolution (untrained) [in progress]
description: This algorithm uses a neural network that has not been trained. It gets better over time.
additionalMessage: It relies on initial weights and is likely to perform suboptimally.

name: Neuro Evolution (trained) [yet to be implemented]
description: This algorithm uses a neural network that has been trained.
additionalMessage: It should perform better than the untrained version.
